languages.text: "Боль может исцелить человеческую душу, но что насчет ксеноса? У меня нет на то ответа".
"Pain can heal a human soul, but what about a xenos? I have no answer for that."
languages.original_text: "Боль может исцелить человеческую душу, но что насчет ксеноса? У меня нет на то ответа".

traits.locale_text: "Pain can heal a human's soul, but what about the xenos's? I have no answer for that."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Pain can heal a human's soul, but what about the xenos's? I have no answer for that."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Pain can heal a human soul, but what about a xenos? I have no answer for that."

languages.text: “痛苦可以净化人类的灵魂，但对异形而言意味着什么？我也不清楚。”
languages.original_text: "Pain can heal a human soul, but what about a xenos? I have no answer for that."

traits.locale_text: “痛苦可以净化人类的灵魂，但对异形而言意味着什么？我也不清楚。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «El dolor puede sanar el alma humana, pero ¿la de una xenos? No tengo respuesta para eso».
languages.original_text: "Pain can heal a human soul, but what about a xenos? I have no answer for that."

traits.locale_text: «El dolor puede sanar el alma humana, pero ¿la de una xenos? No tengo respuesta para eso».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « La douleur peut soigner l'âme humaine, mais je ne sais pas si c'est également le cas pour un xénos. Nous verrons bien. »
languages.original_text: "Pain can heal a human soul, but what about a xenos? I have no answer for that."

traits.locale_text: « La douleur peut soigner l'âme humaine, mais je ne sais pas si c'est également le cas pour un xénos. Nous verrons bien. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Schmerz kann eine menschliche Seele heilen, aber bei einer Xenos? Darauf weiß ich keine Antwort."
languages.original_text: "Pain can heal a human soul, but what about a xenos? I have no answer for that."

traits.locale_text: "Schmerz kann eine menschliche Seele heilen, aber bei einer Xenos? Darauf weiß ich keine Antwort."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「苦痛は人間の魂を癒すが、異種族の場合はどうなのだろうな？我はその答えは持ち合わせていない」
languages.original_text: "Pain can heal a human soul, but what about a xenos? I have no answer for that."

traits.locale_text: 「苦痛は人間の魂を癒すが、異種族の場合はどうなのだろうな？我はその答えは持ち合わせていない」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Acı, insan ruhunu iyileştirebilir ama zenolarda da aynı etkiyi bırakır mı? Bu sorunun cevabını bilmiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Pain can heal a human soul, but what about a xenos? I have no answer for that."

traits.locale_text: "Acı, insan ruhunu iyileştirebilir ama zenolarda da aynı etkiyi bırakır mı? Bu sorunun cevabını bilmiyorum."
